Text: Quest Complete - You have slain the Bloated Miller and received a reward from Renly.
Renly has offered you a reward for slaying the Bloated Miller. Take it.
The Blacksmith appears to be in charge in this logging encampment. Talk to him.
You have slain the Bloated Miller and levelled up. Open the Passive Skill Screen and spend a Passive Skill Point to upgrade your character.
You have slain the Bloated Miller. Enter the logging encampment.
A logging encampment is under attack by a diseased monstrosity that was once human. Kill it.
The wounded man mentioned his chief Miller went to warn Clearfell about a sickness plaguing their men. Track down the Miller and find safety in Clearfell.
Quest Complete - You have slain the Devourer and have received a reward from Renly.
You have slain the Devourer. Talk to Renly in Clearfell for your reward.
Message: Talk to Renly for your reward

Text: You have cornered the Devourer. Kill it.
You have found the Mud Burrow. Search the tunnels for the Devourer.
The Devourer lives underground in a Mud Burrow. Find it.
Find the Devourer in its Mud Burrow and slay it so that the Ezomytes can safely leave the walls of Clearfell once more.
You have released a dark entity called the Hooded One from the Tree of Souls.
You have released a dark entity called the Hooded One from the Tree of Souls. Return to Clearfell Encampment and speak to Una.
You have released a dark entity called the Hooded One from the Tree of Souls. Speak to Una for more information.
Stab each Rune Spike into the Ancient Runes on the Tree of Souls to ask it to release the Hooded One.
Stab each Rune Spike into the Ancient Runes on the Tree of Souls to ask it to release the Hooded One.
Stab each Rune Spike into the Ancient Runes on the Tree of Souls to ask it to release the Hooded One.
Stab each Rune Spike into the Ancient Runes on the Tree of Souls to ask it to release the Hooded One.
Stab each Rune Spike into the Ancient Runes on the Tree of Souls to ask it to release the Hooded One.
Stab each Rune Spike into the Ancient Runes on the Tree of Souls to ask it to release the Hooded One.
Stab each Rune Spike into the Ancient Runes on the Tree of Souls to ask it to release the Hooded One.
You have taken the forged Rune Spikes from Renly. Return to the Grelwood with them.
Renly has forged the Runes of Power from the Red Vale into spikes. Take them from him.
Message: Take the Rune Spikes from Renly

Text: You have found the Runes of Power in the Red Vale. Take them to Renly for forging.
Destroy the Rust King guarding the final Rune of Power.
Destroy the monsters guarding the Rune of Power.
Collect the last Rune of Power from the Obelisks of Rust in the Red Vale.
Collect the last Rune of Power from the Obelisks of Rust in the Red Vale.
Collect the last Rune of Power from the Obelisks of Rust in the Red Vale.
Collect the 2 remaining Runes of Power from the Obelisks of Rust in the Red Vale.
Collect the 2 remaining Runes of Power from the Obelisks of Rust in the Red Vale.
Collect the 2 remaining Runes of Power from the Obelisks of Rust in the Red Vale.
Collect all the Runes of Power in the Red Vale.
Activate the Obelisks of Rust in the Red Vale to collect the Runes of Power for the Hooded One.
The Runes of Power are clearly powerful. Collect all that the Red Vale has to offer.
Residual magic clearly still resides in the Red Vale. Investigate the Obelisks of Rust for the Runes of Power.
This vale is littered with the debris of countless battles. Search it for anything that may still be useful.
The runes you need to release the Hooded One are somewhere in the Red Vale. Look for them.
To release the Hooded One, you must find the 3 runes in the Red Vale. Look for the Vale in the Grelwood.
To release the Hooded One, you must find the 3 runes in the Red Vale. Look for the Red Vale in the Grelwood.
You have found the Tree of Souls. An ancient entity hangs upon it. Summon Una and ask her for advice.
Search the Grelwood for any hint of what might have happened to the Count and his men that fateful night.
Travel through Clearfell to the Grelwood and search for any clues about the night the Count took his men out there.
Quest Complete — You have found Count Lachlann's ring and helped revive the Hooded One.
You have given Count Lachlann's ring to Una and she is reviving the Hooded One. Witness this.
Message: Witness the revival of the Hooded One

Text: To heal the Hooded One's runic wound, Una needs a ring from an ancient Count. Bring Count Lachlann's ring to her in Clearfell Encampment.
Message: Bring Count Lachlann's Ring to Una

Text: To heal the Hooded One's runic wound, Una needs a ring from an ancient Count. Find his grave past the Memorial Gate.
Message: Search for the Count's grave past the Memorial Gate

Text: Una has helped clear the roots. Continue through the Grim Tangle.
Speak to Una about the roots.
Message: Speak to Una about the roots

Text: Summon Una to ask for help clearing the roots.
Message: Summon Una to ask for help clearing the roots

Text: Una has told you about the Count's Signet. She has instructed you to travel through the Grim Tangle in the Grelwood.
Una has told you about the Count's Signet. She has instructed you to travel through the Grim Tangle in the Grelwood.
Una has told you about the Count's Signet. She has instructed you to travel through the Grim Tangle in the Grelwood.
You have found roots blocking the path forward through the Grim Tangle. They are impassable for now.
Message: The roots are impassable for now

Text: Quest Complete - You have returned the Smithing Tools to Renly and he has restored his salvage bench to its former glory.
Bring the tools back to Renly.
Message: Bring the tools back to Renly

Text: Find Renly's tools.
Travel to Ogham Village and find Renly's tools.
Speak to Renly in Clearfell Encampment.
You have returned Una's lute to her and gained two [WeaponSetPassiveSkillPoints|Weapon Set Passive Skill Points] from her reward.
You have returned Una's lute to her, and she has given you a reward.
You have returned Una's lute to her. Speak to her for your reward.
You have found Una's lute. Return it to her at Clearfell Encampment.
You have spotted Una's lute in her home in Ogham Farmlands. Retrieve it for her.
Una's lute was left behind at her home in Ogham Farmlands. Look for it.
Una has asked you to find her lute, left behind at her home in Ogham Farmlands. Go there to look for it.
Quest Complete — You have reunited Lachlann with his family.
You have reunited Lachlann with his family... but it isn't going well. Give him the rest he deserves.
You have opened the Memorial Gate. Follow Lachlann.
You have retrieved both pieces of the Memorial Gate key. Return to the Cemetery of the Eternals and open the gate.
Message: Return to the Cemetery of the Eternals

Text: Pick up Asinia's Memorial Key Piece.
Message: Pick up Asinia's Memorial Key Piece

Text: You have found Asinia, Praetor Draven's Consort. Destroy her and retrieve her piece of the Memorial Gate key.
Search the Tomb of the Consort for Asinia.
Message: Explore the Tomb of the Consort

Text: Search the Tomb of the Consort for Asinia.
Message: Enter the Tomb of the Consort

Text: You have destroyed Praetor Draven, but Asinia remains yet to be found. Search for the Tomb of the Consort.
Message: Return to the Cemetery of the Eternals

Text: Pick up Draven's Memorial Key Piece.
Message: Pick up Draven's Memorial Key Piece

Text: You have found Praetor Draven. Destroy him and retrieve his piece of the Memorial Gate key.
Search the Mausoleum for Draven and his Consort.
Search the Mausoleum for Draven and his Consort.
You have destroyed Praetor Draven and taken his Memorial Key piece, but his consort, Asinia, has yet to be found. Return to the Cemetery of the Eternals and search for the Tomb of the Consort.
Message: Return to the Cemetery of the Eternals

Text: Pick up Draven's Memorial Key Piece.
Message: Pick up Draven's Memorial Key Piece

Text: You have found Praetor Draven. Destroy him and retrieve his piece of the Memorial Gate key.
Search the Mausoleum for Praetor Draven.
Search the Mausoleum for Praetor Draven.
You have destroyed Asinia, but Draven remains yet to be found. Return to the Cemetery of the Eternals and search for the Mausoleum.
Message: Return to the Cemetery of the Eternals

Text: Pick up Asinia's Memorial Key Piece.
Message: Pick up Asinia's Memorial Key Piece

Text: You have found Asinia, Praetor Draven's Consort. Destroy her and retrieve her piece of the Memorial Gate key.
Search the Tomb of the Consort for Draven and his Consort.
Message: Explore the Tomb of the Consort

Text: Search the Tomb of the Consort for Draven and his Consort.
Message: Enter the Tomb of the Consort

Text: Lachlann has asked you to help him find the keys to the Memorial gate to save his family. Find Draven and his Consort in the Tomb of the Consort and the Mausoleum.
Quest Complete - You have cleansed the Ritual Altars for Finn and he has rewarded you with an Uncut Support Gem.
You have defeated the King in the Mists and cleansed the Ritual Altars in Freythorn. Speak to Finn for a reward.
Message: Talk to Finn for your reward

Text: You have found the King in the Mists guarding the final Ritual Altar in Freythorn. Defeat him to cleanse the altar.
Message: Defeat the King in the Mists

Text: Search for Ritual Altars in Freythorn, and cleanse them.
Search for Freythorn above the Hunting Grounds, beyond the Graveyard.
You have killed the Executioner and freed Leitis. You have been rewarded with an Uncut Skill Gem.
You have freed Leitis and she has returned to Clearfell. Return to Clearfell and speak to her.
You have freed the Executioner's prisoner. Talk to her.
The Executioner had an imprisoned woman nearby. Free her.
You have spotted the Executioner that tried to hang you before your escape. Kill him.
You have found Ogham Village. Look for the Seed of Corruption.
Message: Search for the Seed of Corruption

Text: Continue through Ogham Farmlands to look for the entrance to Ogham Village.
Message: Find the entrance to the Village

Text: Cut through the Hunting Grounds and find the entrance to Ogham Village.
Message: Find the entrance to the Village

Text: Una has told you to get to the village by cutting through the Hunting Grounds. Return to the Graveyard and enter the Hunting Grounds.
Quest Complete - You have slain the Mad Wolf, freeing the Ezomytes from Count Geonor's reign.
Speak to the Hooded One to travel to the Vastiri Outskirts in pursuit of Oriana and the Beast.
You have slain the Mad Wolf and freed Ogham, but Oriana has escaped with the Beast. Return to town and speak to the Hooded one.
You have finally come face to face with Count Geonor. Slay him and free Ogham.
You have found the diseased heart of the Manor. Face Count Geonor.
You have spotted the Mad Wolf. Find your way into the pit below the Manor.
Something horrible has happened in the Manor. Fight through the madness and find Count Geonor.
Leitis has asked you to find a way into the Manor and to depose Count Geonor.
Quest Complete - You have rescued the Ardura Caravan and earned passage upon it.
You have defeated the Sun Clan hyenas and their leader, Rathbreaker. Return to Zarka and give her the news.
You have found the Sun Clan leader, Rathbreaker. Defeat him.
The Maraketh Caravan cannot travel while hyenic raiders are harassing the trade route. Find them and destroy them.
The Hooded One believes the Maraketh will lend aid in pursuit of the Seed of Corruption. Find a caravan on the nearby trade route.
Speak to the Hooded One concerning what to do next.
Quest Complete - You have pursued the Beast across the Vastiri Outskirts and defeated Jamanra, the Abomination in combat.
The lost empire of the Vaal may hold ancient knowledge that will aid in containing the Beast. Talk to Asala to travel south. The Maraketh will bring you to the Sandswept Marsh.
Message: Talk to Asala to travel south to the Sandswept Marsh

Text: The Countess escaped with the Beast once again. Speak to the Hooded One for further clarity on what to do next. He can be found in a shrine to the northwest of the caravan, that you must travel to on foot.
Message: Head down a ramp northwest of the Caravan's midpoint

Text: The Countess escaped with the Beast once again. Speak to the Hooded One for further clarity on what to do next. He can be found in a shrine to the northwest of the caravan, that you must travel to on foot.
Message: Speak to the Hooded One in the Shrine to the Northwest

Text: Defeat Jamanra, the Abomination in combat.
According to Risu, the Beast is kept in a cage behind Jamanra, the Abomination's throne. Fight your way there.
Message: Fight your way to the the Throne

Text: According to Risu, the Beast is kept in a cage behind Jamanra, the Abomination's throne. Fight your way there.
Use the Desert Map to travel to the Dreadnought.
Message: Use the Desert Map to travel to the Dreadnought

Text: The Ardura have finally caught up to the Faridun. Speak to Asala to learn about the final battle.
The Faridun have escaped with the Beast. Defeat Tor Gul, the Defiler, so that you may continue pursuing them.
Defeat Jamanra, the Abomination atop Deshar.
The Faridun are atop Deshar. Find their King and confront him.
The Faridun may already be feeding the Honoured Dead to the Beast. Travel through the Path of Mourning and confront them.
Message: Travel through the Path of Mourning

Text: The Faridun may already be feeding the Honoured Dead to the Beast. Ascend Deshar and confront them.
The Faridun may already be feeding the Honoured Dead at the Maraketh Burial Spires to the Beast. Use the Desert Map to travel there and confront them.
Message: Use the Desert Map to travel to Deshar

Text: You have sounded the Horn of the Vastiri and dispelled Jamanra, the Risen King's sandstorm. Speak to Asala.
You have returned to the Sandstorm. Use the Horn of the Vastiri to dispel it.
Message: Use the Horn of the Vastiri

Text: You and Zarka have recreated the Horn of the Vastiri. Use the Desert Map to return to the Sandstorm to dispel it.
Message: Use the Desert Map to return to the Sandstorm

Text: You have provided everything required to recreate the Horn of the Vastiri. Speak to Zarka to obtain it.
Message: Take the Horn of the Vastiri

Text: Zarka has determined that only recreating the Horn of the Vastiri will serve to dispel Jamanra, the Risen King's sandstorm. Retrace the legendary Orbala's footsteps to make a Horn of your own.
Message: Recreate the Horn of the Vastiri

Text: Zarka has determined that only recreating the Horn of the Vastiri will serve to dispel Jamanra, the Risen King's sandstorm. Speak to Asala to learn about Orbala's footsteps.
You have found a desert sandstorm that is blocking the path forward. Return to the caravan and speak to Zarka to find out how to proceed.
A Corrupted leader known as Jamanra, the Risen King has united the Faridun and attacked the Maraketh. Help Asala defeat him.
The third Gate mechanism has been destroyed. Fight your way forward.
The Ardura Maraketh have run into some trouble. Assist Sekhema Asala in fighting the enemy and opening the Gates.
The Ardura Maraketh have run into some trouble. Assist Sekhema Asala in fighting the enemy and opening the Gates.
The Ardura Maraketh have run into some trouble. Assist Sekhema Asala in fighting the enemy and opening the Gates.
Message: Assist Asala in opening the Gates

Text: Risu, a defector of the Faridun, has informed you of a way to the top of the gates. Ascend Traitor's Passage to reach them.
Use the Desert Map to travel to Traitor's Passage.
Message: Use the Desert Map to travel to Traitor's Passage

Text: Talk to Asala about Risu's information.
Message: Talk to Asala about Risu's information

Text: Return to town and talk to Risu about the locked Halani Gates.
Message: Talk to Risu about the closed Gates

Text: Use the Desert Map to travel to the Halani Gates.
Message: Use the Desert Map to travel to the Halani Gates

Text: Return to town and find Asala at the lead cart to question the Defector about Jamanra, the Risen King's destinations.
Message: Return to the Caravan with the Defector

Text: You have found a Faridun defector. Question her.
Destroy Rudja, Dread Engineer.
You have discovered a foundry run by the Faridun, which now seems to be abandoned. Investigate it.
Enter Mawdun Mine and continue your search for the Beast.
Explore Mawdun Quarry in your search for the Beast.
Use the Desert Map to travel to Mawdun Quarry in search of the Faridun, who may have closed the Halani Gates.
Message: Use the Desert Map to travel to Mawdun Quarry

Text: The Halani Gates are unexpectedly closed. Ask Asala what to do next.
Scouts have reported Corruption in two areas. Use the Desert Map to travel to either in search of the Beast.
Consult with Asala to learn more about the Beast.
The Hooded One believes the Ardura will aid in the pursuit of the Seed of Corruption. Speak with the Sekhema to request their support.
You have boarded the Ardura Caravan. Speak to the Hooded One for information on what your next move should be.
Quest Complete - The Flame Ruby has been retrieved from the Titan Grotto and given to Zarka.
Zarka has offered you a reward for defeating Zalmarath, the Colossus. Take it.
Take the Flame Ruby to the Ardura Caravan. Zarka will know what to do with it.
Message: Take the Flame Ruby to town

Text: You have defeated Zalmarath, the Colossus and it has dropped a Flame Ruby. Pick it up.
You have found the altar and invoked the Rite of Flame. Defeat Zalmarath, the Colossus to prove yourself.
You must invoke the Rite of Flame at a cerulean altar. Find it.
Message: Search for the Rite of Flame altar

Text: You have opened the way into the Titan Grotto. Enter it.
Message: Enter the Titan Grotto at the Clasped Entry

Text: Find and activate additional Ancient Seals.
Message: Find and activate additional Ancient Seals

Text: According to Maraketh knowledge of the Third Pact, there is some way under Valley of the Titans. Find it.
Message: Find a way into the Titan Grotto

Text: Use the Desert Map to travel to Valley of the Titans.
Message: Use the Desert Map to travel to Valley of the Titans

Text: Quest Complete - You have found the Essence of Water at the heart of Keth.
Zarka has offered you a reward for bringing back the Essence of Water.
You have burned the Water Goddess alive at her request. Return to the Ardura Caravan.
Pick up the Essence of Water.
Message: Pick up the Essence of Water

Text: You have used the Everburning Cinders to put the Water Goddess to rest. She will soon be at peace.
Message: Witness the Water Goddess being put to rest

Text: The Water Goddess has requested you end her suffering. Use the nearby Everburning Cinders to grant her request.
There is a Water Goddess lying in a shrine at the heart of Keth. Talk to her to see if you can render aid.
Destroy Azarian, the Forsaken Son to access the shrine that supposedly holds the Essence of Water.
According to Zarka, the Essence of Water was kept in a shrine at the center of Keth Sanctum. Find it.
Message: Search for the Essence of Water

Text: According to Zarka, the Essence of Water can be found in a Sanctum at the heart of Keth. Find it.
Keth has been buried by centuries of shifting sands. Find a way to access the city proper.
Use the Desert Map to travel to Keth.
Message: Use the Desert Map to travel to Keth

Text: Quest Complete - You have returned the Mastodon Tusks to the Ardura for safekeeping.
Zarka is offering you a reward for the securing the Mastodon Tusks. Take it.
Return to the Ardura Caravan and give the Mastodon Tusks to Zarka for safekeeping.
You have defeated Ekbab, Ancient Steed. Retrieve the Mastodon Tusks.
Ekbab, Ancient Steed is a guardian of the Mastodon Tusks. He is assisted by Iktab, the Deathlord. Destroy them both and retrieve the Tusks.
Message: Defeat Ekbab, Ancient Steed and Iktab, the Deathlord

Text: The Mastodon Tusks are somewhere in the Bone Pits. Find them.
Message: Search the Bone Pits for the Mastodon Tusks

Text: Jamanra, the Risen King seeks to retrieve powerful Mastodon Tusks that may grant him and his minions lightning abilities. Search the Mastodon Badlands to find the entrance to the Bone Pits.
Message: Search for the entrance to the Bone Pits

Text: Use the Desert Map to travel to the Mastodon Badlands.
Message: Use the Desert Map to travel to the Mastodon Badlands

Text: Quest Complete - You searched Deshar and found a final letter. Shambrin burned it without reading it, but intends to secretly remember the person that wrote it.
You have returned the final letter to Shambrin and she has given you a Book of Specialisation.
You have returned the final letter to Shambrin. Speak to her for your reward.
You found a recent corpse and a final letter that has no named recipient. Return it to Shambrin.
Shambrin has asked you to search for the possible corpse of someone she cared about. Check the base of each tower.
Message: Search for evidence of Lailuma's fate

Text: Shambrin has asked you to travel to Deshar and search for the possible corpse of someone she cared about.
You found a final letter that has no named recipient. Return to the Ardura Caravan and ask about it.
An abandoned rhoa you passed on the way into Deshar indicates that someone Maraketh may have run into trouble here.
You have inserted the Sun Clan and Kabala Clan Relics and can now choose to side with one of the Clans and receive a permanent reward.
Insert the Sun Clan Relic.
Insert the Kabala Clan Relic.
You have found something that looks like it would hold the Relics. Insert them.
You have found two mysterious Relics. Find a use for them.
Message: Find a use for the Relics

Text: You have found a mysterious Relic. Find a use for it.
Message: Find a use for the Relic

Text: You have placed one Relic into the altar but it looks like it can hold one more. Find it.
Place the Relic in the altar that you found.
Message: Place the Relic in the altar that you found

Text: Find something that can be placed in the altar.
Message: Find something that can be placed in the altar

Text: Quest Complete - You have completed the Trial of the Sekhemas and have chosen an Ascendancy as a reward.
Quest Complete - You have completed the Trial of the Sekhemas and have obtained Ascendancy Passive Points as a reward.
Use the Altar of Ascendancy to obtain Ascendancy Passive Skill Points.
Message: Use the Altar of Ascendancy to obtain Ascendancy Passive Skill Points

Text: Use the Altar of Ascendancy to choose your Ascendancy.
Message: Use the Altar of Ascendancy to choose your Ascendancy

Text: Defeat Rattlecage, the Earthbreaker.
Complete the Trial of the Sekhemas.
Message: Complete the Trial of the Sekhemas

Text: Begin your Test of Strength.
Place your Key into the Relic Altar to begin the Trial of the Sekhemas.
Speak to Balbala, the Released.
You have found the Relic Altar. Place your Barya into it.
Message: Place your Barya into the Relic Altar

Text: Find a Relic Altar in the Trial of the Sekhemas to place your Barya into.
Use the Desert Map to travel to the Trial of the Sekhemas.
Message: Use the Desert Map to travel to the Trial of the Sekhemas

Text: Return to the Ardura Caravan and speak to Zarka about what you have just found.
Search Traitor's Passage for more information on the Barya you found.
Quest Complete - You have captured the foremost Vaal expert on the Beast, and brought him to the present to aid you now.
Quest Complete - You have captured the foremost Vaal expert on the Beast, and brought him to the present to aid you now.
Speak to Doryani in Ziggurat Encampment.
Message: Speak to Doryani in Ziggurat Encampment

Text: Travel through the Time Portal in Town to enter Cruel Difficulty.
Doryani was the Vaal's foremost expert on the Beast and corruption. Capture him, so that you may interrogate him.
Doryani was the Vaal's foremost expert on the Beast and corruption. Find him and free Alva.
Message: Find Doryani in the Black Chambers

Text: Fight your way through Aggorat and find the Black Chambers to free Alva.
You have found Aggorat. Enter it and seek out the Black Chambers to free Alva.
Alva has been taken to Aggorat. Find her before it's too late.
Viper Napuatzi has had Alva taken to Doryani. Defeat Viper Napuatzi to open the path forward and free Alva.
You have somehow traveled to the past! You are no longer looking for an ancient repository. Search for knowledge about the Beast from the living Vaal themselves.
You have entered the Time Portal and have been taken back in time. Enter Utzaal.
Enter the Time Portal to go back in time to the past.
Alva has activated an elevator that appears to go up into Ziggurat Encampment. Ride it up.
Speak to Alva about the significance of this chamber.
Alva may have an interest in what happened in the Temple of Kopec. Summon her and let her know.
Defeat Ketzuli, High Priest of the Sun.
Message: Defeat Ketzuli, High Priest of the Sun

Text: You have finally gained access to the Temple of Kopec. Explore it in search of the Vaal repository of knowledge.
You have used the key to open the entrance to the Temple of Kopec. Enter it and seek out the Vaal repository of knowledge.
You have shown the Temple Door Idol to Alva. She wants you to open the door to the Temple of Kopec.
Message: Open the door to the Temple of Kopec

Text: You have found a key to the Temple of Kopec underneath the treasure hunter encampment. Open the door and enter it.
Message: Return to Alva with the Temple Door Idol

Text: You have defeated the Queen of Filth and she has dropped a Temple Door Idol. It looks like it would fit into the door to the Temple of the Sun God. Pick it up.
Message: Pick up the Temple Door Idol

Text: You have found the Queen of Filth. Defeat her as she may contain the key you are looking for.
Explore Aggorat in search of a key to unlock the entrance to the Temple of the Sun God.
You have found the entrance to Aggorat. Enter it and seek out a key to unlock the entrance to the Temple of the Sun God.
The entrance to the Temple of the Sun God is locked. Search for a key in the Aggorat beyond The Drowned City.
The entrance to the Temple of the Sun God is locked. Search for a key in the Aggorat beyond The Drowned City.
You have lowered the water and revealed the Sunken City of Utzaal. Return to town and go down the southwestern stairs to enter it.
You have gained access to The Matlan Waterways. Find the control mechanisms and drain the area.
You have gained access to The Matlan Waterways. Enter the area, find the control mechanisms and drain the area.
You have retrieved the large Soul Core. Return to Infested Barrens and activate the Stone Altar to gain passage to The Matlan Waterways.
You have defeated Zicoatl, Warden of the Core. Pick up the Large Soul Core.
Message: Pick up the Large Soul Core

Text: Defeat Zicoatl, Warden of the Core to obtain the Large Soul Core.
The Large Soul Core near Alva is now retrievable. Collect it.
To retrieve the large Soul Core you need, Alva has advised you that you must find two medium Soul Cores and use them to activate two Generators in Jiquani's Sanctum.
You've found a mysterious symbol on the floor. Speak to Alva to learn more about what is going on here.
You've found a mysterious symbol on the floor. Summon Alva to learn more about what is going on here.
You have found Jiquani's Sanctum. Explore it in search of the large Soul Core.
You have found a small Soul Core and opened the door of the Machinarium. Proceed deeper into the ruin.
You have found a small Soul Core. Take it to the Stone Altar to proceed deeper into the ruin.
Your way is blocked by a massive stone door. The operating mechanism requires a small Soul Core. Find one in the vicinity.
Message: Search for a small Soul Core

Text: You have discovered another stone altar. Ask Alva for advice about how to activate it.
You have discovered another stone altar. Summon Alva for advice about how to activate it.
You have found an ancient Vaal facility. Search within for a large Soul Core.
Message: Search for a large Soul Core

Text: You have defeated the Machinarium's guardian chimera. Enter the facility.
A massive beast seems to be guarding the entrance to the Machinarium. Defeat it.
Servi has told you the tale of a ruin where a large Soul Core might be found. Search for the Machinarium within the Chimeral Wetlands.
Servi has told you the tale of a ruin where a large Soul Core might be found. Find the Chimeral Wetlands, and cross it in search of the Machinarium.
The stone altar in Infested Barrens requires a large Soul Core for power. Ask Servi if she or her tribe know where one might be found.
You have discovered a stone altar that seems to be a control mechanism for a canal. Summon Alva to ask her for advice on this ancient mechanism.
Ancient ruined canals lead into the jungle. Follow them in search of The Matlan Waterways.
Somewhere in the region are canals that could potentially be used to lower the water and reveal the city. Find The Matlan Waterways.
Somewhere in the region are canals that could potentially be used to lower the water and reveal the city. Find The Matlan Waterways.
The Sunken City of Utzaal appears to live up to its name. Ask the Hooded One about potentially lowering the water to reveal the city.
The Sunken City of Utzaal appears to live up to its name. Ask the Hooded One about potentially lowering the water to reveal the city.
You have found a group of treasure hunters already camped on a ziggurat in the middle of a lake. Explore their camp to find out more.
Only one seat of Vaal civilisation remains unlooted: the Sunken City of Utzaal. Explore the Sandswept Marsh in search of its most prominent Ziggurat.
Speak to the Hooded One about what do to next.
Quest Complete - You have captured the foremost Vaal expert on the Beast and have been given a Waystone as a reward.
Take a Waystone reward from Doryani in The Ziggurat Refuge.
Speak to Doryani.
Speak to Alva about what just happened.

Text: Quest Complete - You have found a venom vial in the The Venom Crypts and Servi has rewarded you.
Consume the Venom Draught that Servi made for you.

Text: Quest Complete - You have slain Ignagduk, the Bog Witch and have been rewarded with a Flask.
Take the Reward from Servi.
You have slain Ignagduk, the Bog Witch and freed the spirits of the children she stole. Talk to Servi and tell her the good news.
Ignagduk's Ghastly Spear would serve well as proof that you've killed her. Pick it up.
You have found Ignagduk, the Bog Witch. Slay her and free the spirits of the children she has stolen.
Servi has asked you to slay Ignagduk, the Bog Witch and free the spirits of her tribe's stolen children.
Speak to Servi and ask her for advice.
You have found the village of the Carver. Summon Servi and ask her for advice.
Quest Complete - You have delivered The Hammer of Kamasa to Oswald and have been rewarded with an Uncut Skill Gem, Gold and access to the Reforging Bench.
The Hammer of Kamasa could be of interest to Oswald. Bring it back to him in Ziggurat Encampment.
Message: Bring The Hammer of Kamasa to Oswald in Ziggurat Encampment

Text: Goldcrush has dropped a Hammer. This could be of interest to Oswald. Pick it up and bring it back to Oswald in Ziggurat Encampment.
Message: Pick up The Hammer of Kamasa

Text: You have encountered the forgemaster, Mektul. Defeat him.
You have entered The Molten Vault. Clear it out in search of riches.
Oswald wants you to enter The Molten Vault and clear it out, looking for riches while you do so.
Speak to Oswald about the monkey statues.
You have spotted the monkey statues that Oswald spoke about just ahead. Summon Oswald and give him the news.
You have spotted some monkey statues just ahead. Summon Oswald and speak to him for more information.
Oswald has told you to keep a look out for buildings with Monkey statues on them. Search for The Molten Vault.
[DNT] Quest Complete - You have met Alva, Rog and Makoru. You are now familiar with how to come and go from Kingsmarch at your will.
Makoru can take you wherever you'd like to go. Pick an island and set sail.
Speak to Makoru to hire her ship.
Alva has advised that you speak to Rog to sell your artefacts and hire a ship. Speak to Rog.
You have arrived in Kingsmarch. Talk to Alva about selling your artefacts and hiring a ship.
